verbs.description: SEOUL , South Korea ( AP ) - The on - again , off - again meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: has] been an emotional roller coaster for South Koreans , who now await Tuesday 's historic summit with both hope and doubt .

SEOUL , South Korea ( AP ) - [ARG1: The on - again , off - again meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] has [V: been] [ARG2: an emotional roller coaster] [ARGM-GOL: for South Koreans , who now await Tuesday 's historic summit with both hope and doubt] .

SEOUL , South Korea ( AP ) - The on - again , off - again meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has been an emotional roller coaster for [ARG1: South Koreans] , [R-ARG1: who] [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: await] [ARG2: Tuesday 's historic summit] [ARGM-MNR: with both hope and doubt] .
